content:
I have several errors in the QA for my IG that look like this
URL value 'http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pocd/CodeSystem/measurement-status' does not resolve
I assume such errors are due to the fact these IG (pocd and PHD) are not yet published? It's been more than a year since I have looked at anything but Bluetooth and I think that was the case. Once published, these URLs should resolve, correct?
did this get sorted in one of the many threads about this?
